info.title: School Management System
info.description: This is a sample api documentation for a school management,which will be use as guide to fully document the api and use to develop the client application for this system.This documentation therefore makes use of an already built api found in swapi.dev

get.summary: Return a list of all person in the Star World universe
get.description: Get all people resources found in the Star world universe

get.summary: Retrieve the resource for a person through a search using the person's name
get.description: Find the resource for a particular person using the name of the person as search parameter

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: The name of the person resource been search

get.summary: Get the resource of a specific person using the ID
get.description: Retrieves the resource of a person using the ID

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: THe ID of the person resource you to get

get.summary: Returns a list of all films
Retrieve the resource for a film through a search using the title of the film
get.description: Find the resource for a particular film using the name of the film as the search parameter

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: The name of the film resource been search

get.summary: Get the resource of a specific film using the ID
get.description: Retrieves the resource of a film using the ID

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: THe ID of the film resource you to get

get.summary: Returns a list of all starships in the star world universe
Retrieve the resource for a starship through a search using either the name or model of the starship
get.description: Find the resource for a particular person using either the name or model of the starship used as the search parameter

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: The name or model of the starship resource been search

get.summary: Get the resource of a specific starship using the ID
get.description: Retrieves the resource of a starship using the ID

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: THe ID of the starship resource you to get

get.summary: Returns a list of all vehicles in the star world universe
Retrieve the resource for a vehicle through a search using either the name or model of the vehicle
get.description: Find the resource for a particular vehicle using the name or model used as the search parameter

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: The name or model of the vehicle resource been search

get.summary: Get the resource of a specific vehicle using the ID
get.description: Retrieves the resource of a vehicle using the ID

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the vehicle resource

get.summary: Returns a list of all planets in the star world universe
Retrieve the resource for a planet through a search using planet's name
get.description: Find the resource for a particular planet using the name as  search parameter

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: The name of the planet resource been search

get.summary: Get the resource of a specific planet using the ID
get.description: Retrieves the resource of a planet using the ID

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: THe ID of the planet resource you to get

get.summary: Returns a list of all species in the star world universe
Retrieve the resource for a specie through a search using species's name
get.description: Find the resource for a particular specie using the name as  search parameter

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: The name of the specie resource been search

get.summary: Get the resource of a specific specie using the ID
get.description: Retrieves the resource of a specie using the ID

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: THe ID of the specie resource you to get

birth_year.description: The birth year of the person, using the in-universe standard of BBY or ABY - Before the Battle of Yavin or After the Battle of Yavin.

eye_color.description: The eye color of the person

gender.description: The gender of this person. Either "Male", "Female" or "unknown", "n/a" if the person does not have a gender.

hair_color.description: The hair color of the person

height.description: The height of the person in centimeters

mass.description: THe mass of the perosn in kilograms

skin_color.description: The skin color of the person

homeworld.description: The URL of a planet resource, a planet that this person was born on or inhabits.

films.description: An array of film resource URLs that this person has been in.

species.description: An array of species resource URLs that this person belongs to.

starships.description: An array of starships resource URLs that this person belongs to.

vehicles.description: An array of vehicle resource URLs that this person has piloted.

created.description: The ISO 8601 date format of the time that this resource was created.

edited.description: The ISO 8601 date format of the time that this resource was edited.

episode_id.description: The episode number of the film

opening_crawl.description: THe opening paragraphs at he begining of the film

director.description: The name of the director of the film

producer.description: The name(s) of the producer(s) of the film. Comma seperated

release_date.description: The ISO8601 date format of film release at original creator country

species.description: An array of species resource URLs that are in the film

startships.description: An array of starships resource URLs that are in the film

vehicles.description: An array of vehicle resource URLs that are in this film.

characters.description: An array of people resource URLs that are in this film.

planets.description: An array of planet resource URLs that are in this film.

url.description: The hypermedia URL of this resource

created.description: the ISO 8601 date format of the time that this resource was created.

edited.description: the ISO 8601 date format of the time that this resource was edited.

name.description: The title of this starship. The common nsmr such as "Death Star"

model.description: The model or official name of this starship. Such as "T-65 X-wing" or "DS-1 Orbital Battle Station".

starship_class.description: The class of this starship, such as "Starfighter" or "Deep Space Mobile Battlestation"

manufacturer.description: The manufacturer of this starship, comma seperated in more than one

cost_in_credits.description: The cost of this starship new, in galactic credits

length.description: The length of this starship in meters

crew.description: The number of personnel needed to run or pilot this starship

passengers.description: The number of non-essential people this starship can transport

max_atmosphering_speed.description: The maximum speed of this starship in the atmosphere. "N/A" if this starship is incapable of atmospheric flight.

hyperdrive_rating.description: The class of this starships hyperdrive

MGLT.description: The Maximum number of Megalights this starship can travel in a standard hour. A "Megalight" is a standard unit of distance and has never been defined before within the Star Wars universe. This figure is only really useful for measuring the difference in speed of starships. We can assume it is similar to AU, the distance between our Sun (Sol) and Earth.

cargo_capacity.description: The maximum number of kilograms that this starship can transport

consumables.description: The maximum length of time that this starship can provide consumables for its entire crew without having to resupply.

films.description: An array of Film URL Resources that this starship has appeared in.

pilots.description: An array of People URL Resources that this starship has appeared in.

urL.description: The hypermedia URL of this resource

created.description: the ISO 8601 date format of the time that this resource was created.

edited.description: the ISO 8601 date format of the time that this resource was edited.

name.description: The name of this vehicle. The common name, such as "Sand Crawler" or "Speeder bike".

model.description: The model or official name of this vehicle. Such as "All-Terrain Attack Transport".

vehicle_class.description: The class of this vehicle, such as "Wheeled" or "Repulsorcraft".

manufacturer.description: The manufacturer of this vehicle, comma seperated in more than one

cost_in_credits.description: The cost of this vehicle new, in Galactic Credits.

length.description: The length of this vehicle in meters

crew.description: The number of personnel needed to run or pilot this vehicle

passengers.description: The number of non-essential people this vehicle can transport

max_atmosphering_speed.description: The maximum speed of this vehicle in the atmosphere.

cargo_capacity.description: The maximum number of kilograms that this vehicle can transport

consumables.description: The maximum length of time that this vehicle can provide consumables for its entire crew without having to resupply.

films.description: An array of Film URL Resources that this vehicle has appeared in.

pilots.description: An array of People URL Resources that this vehicle has appeared in.

urL.description: The hypermedia URL of this resource

created.description: the ISO 8601 date format of the time that this resource was created.

edited.description: the ISO 8601 date format of the time that this resource was edited.

diameter.description: The diameter of this planet in kilometers.

rotation_period.description: The number of standard hours it takes for this planet to complete a single rotation on its axis.

orbital_period.description: The number of standard days it takes for this planet to complete a single orbit of its local star.

gravity.description: A number denoting the gravity of this planet, where "1" is normal or 1 standard G. "2" is twice or 2 standard Gs. "0.5" is half or 0.5 standard Gs.

population.description: The average population of sentient beings inhabiting this planet.

climate.description: The climate of this planet. Comma separated if diverse.

terrain.description: The terrain of this planet. Comma separated if diverse.

surface_water.description: The percentage of the planet surface that is naturally occurring water or bodies of water.

residents.description: An array of People URL Resources that live on this planet.

films.description: An array of Film URL Resources that this vehicle has appeared in

urL.description: The hypermedia URL of this resource

created.description: the ISO 8601 date format of the time that this resource was created.

edited.description: the ISO 8601 date format of the time that this resource was edited.

classification.description: The classification of this species, such as "mammal" or "reptile".

designation.description: The designation of this species, such as "sentient".

average_height.description: The average height of this species in centimeters.

average_lifespan.description: The average lifespan of this species in years.

eye_colors.description: A comma-separated string of common eye colors for this species, "none" if this species does not typically have eyes.

hair_colors.description: A comma-separated string of common hair colors for this species, "none" if this species does not typically have hair.

skin_colors.description: A comma-separated string of common skin colors for this species, "none" if this species does not typically have skin.

language.description: he language commonly spoken by this species..

homeworld.description: The URL of a planet resource, a planet that this species originates from.

people.description: An array of poeple URL Resources that this vehicle has appeared in.

films.description: An array of Film URL Resources that this vehicle has appeared in

urL.description: The hypermedia URL of this resource

created.description: the ISO 8601 date format of the time that this resource was created.

edited.description: the ISO 8601 date format of the time that this resource was edited.
